text:
e="preserve">MOGAI, sometimes known as IMOGA and MOGII is an alternative acronym to replace SAGA (sexuality and gender alliance), sexual minority and LGBT, standing for marginalized orientations and gender alignments or identities and additionally intersex.
Many times this conotes neologisms, buzzwords and conlangs applied to gender and other identity labels, that are recent, unheard-of or uncommon to most people.
